name: Kim Quyen Ly
title: Senior Software Developer and Research Engineer
summary: Experienced Software Developer and Research Engineer with a background in Computer Science, specializing in back-end development, blockchain technologies, functional programming, formal verification, and technical writing. I've worked extensively on Tezos blockchain projects, playing a key role in protocol upgrades and applying advanced research in areas like static analysis and abstract interpretation to real-world problems. My experience is hands-on and practical, and I'm comfortable tackling challenges under tight deadlines. I enjoy learning new technologies quickly and adapting to different environments to deliver impactful results.

description: Led research in machine learning and computer vision
Published multiple papers in top-tier conferences
Worked on deep learning models for natural language processing
